name: BLUB! (English subtitles version)
description:
BLUB! is a game made for ludum dare 38 by:

- Javier Cobos (Game design & Programming)

-Raquel Cholbi & Dámaris Herrera (Art & Design)

- Iris González (Sound & Writing)

- Yago de Hita (Voice & Writing)

Although most of the decisions were taken collectively.
